alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Weber and northern Davis Counties through 330 PM MDT... At 258 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Syracuse, or near Layton, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Layton, Hill Air Force Base, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, Clinton, Hooper, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, West Point, Sunset, Fruit Heights and Antelope Island State Park. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 327 and 336. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
